name: Conclusion, from The Wretched of the Earth
name_original: Conclusion, from The Wretched of the Earth
description:
Conclusion, from The Wretched of the Earth is an educational game developed by Marxists Bitsy Archive. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Conclusion, from The Wretched of the Earth on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
